description:
2.5D puzzle actionIn the midst of the conflict, sisters Fortuna and Ellie are captured by the slavers.
During the wagon ride, Fortuna escapes her sister Ellie by taking advantage of a momentary lapse in the slavers' minions.
To seek help from Empire knights garrison which Fortuna belongs, and to escape from her pursuers, Ellie sets out for the dangerous forest of Erlit.
Control Ellie in this puzzle action game as she tries to find her way out of the forest.
Ellie doesn't have the power to fight, so you'll have to run away from demonic beasts and use gimmicks in the forest to confront them.
You can use controller in action part.A beautiful world expressed in 3D
The forest is full of dangers and it's difficult to clear on the first try.
However, even if you fail, you can resume right before, so it won't hurt the tempo.
You can use the keyboard, but we recommend using the gamepad. A further evolution of the sex scene
The camera can be operated freely at any time (free camera
Adjustable sound volume
You can now also switch the camera sensitivity and inversion.
It can also be used to change the visibleness of costumes, men, penis, and background accessories.
The expression of fluids such as tears and semen has also evolved further.A highly flexible dress-up system
You can set your clothes, hair color to eye color, (At the time of release, there is only one type of clothing. We'll add more as we update.
The combination patterns are endless!
And of course, you can control the character in any outfit you want.
